alert.note: Alert for Tinian (Marianas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 26 at 10:49AM ChST by NWS Guam
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1215 PM CHST... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHEN...Until 1215 PM CHST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. Overflowing poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1246 AM UTC, Satellite imagery shows heavy rain approaching Tinian Island from the south. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Overflowing poor drainage areas will cause minor flooding in Tinian Island. - Rainfall amounts of 2 to 3 inches are expected over the area. This rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... San Jose (Tinian Municipality), Marpo Heights, Carolinas Heights, Eastern Tinian (Marpo Valley), Carolinas, Western Tinian and Northern Tinian. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
